nodes.text: Droid in Contrast was a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin, which took place during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It depicted a FX-series medical assistant droid and its look suggested it was created by an artist attempting to learn a new style. The color choices of light blue and white were unique and made the painting almost unbearable to look at.

Droid in Contrast was a painting available to players of the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was released on June 26, 2003 and shut down on December 15, 2011. It could be obtained by looting a picture printer and various other items from enemies within the game. Once collected, the player could combine the items and get a random painting. The other paintings players could receive were Bio-Engineer Poster and Double Helix. The player could use the painting as decoration for their home.
